description: This file defines implementations for various output methods for messages, including console, syslog, file, JSON serialization, and UDP transmission. It also includes a method for converting message metadata to a string. The file is part of the WPEFramework project, specifically within the MessageControl component.

classes.name: WPEFramework::Publishers::Text
classes.description: Class providing a method to convert message info and text into a summarized string representation.

classes.name: WPEFramework::Publishers::ConsoleOutput
classes.description: Class responsible for outputting messages to the console.

classes.name: WPEFramework::Publishers::SyslogOutput
classes.description: Class responsible for outputting messages to the syslog.

classes.name: WPEFramework::Publishers::FileOutput
classes.description: Class responsible for writing messages to a file.

classes.name: WPEFramework::Publishers::JSON
classes.description: Class providing JSON serialization of message metadata and text.

classes.name: WPEFramework::Publishers::UDPOutput::Channel
classes.description: Class representing a UDP communication channel used by UDPOutput.

classes.name: WPEFramework::Publishers::UDPOutput
classes.description: Class handling UDP message output via channels.

methods.name: string Convert(const Core::Messaging::MessageInfo & metadata,const string & text)
methods.description: Converts message metadata and text into a summarized string.

methods.name: void Message(const Core::Messaging::MessageInfo & metadata,const string & text)
methods.description: Outputs a message to the console.

methods.name: Message
methods.description: Outputs a message to syslog or printf depending on platform.

methods.name: Message
methods.description: Writes a message to a file if the file is open.

methods.name: void Convert(const Core::Messaging::MessageInfo & metadata,const string & text,Data & data)
methods.description: Serializes message metadata and text into JSON format, respecting output options.

methods.name: Channel(const Core::NodeId & nodeId)
methods.description: Constructs a UDP channel with a specific node ID.

methods.name: ~Channel()
methods.description: Destructor for UDP channel, closes socket.

methods.name: uint16_t SendData(uint8_t * dataFrame,const uint16_t maxSendSize)
methods.description: Sends data over UDP channel, copying from internal buffer.

methods.name: uint16_t ReceiveData(uint8_t *,const uint16_t)
methods.description: Placeholder for receiving data, not used.

methods.name: void Output(const Core::Messaging::Metadata & metadata,const Core::Messaging::IEvent * message)
methods.description: Serializes and queues message data for transmission over UDP.

methods.name: UDPOutput(const Core::NodeId & nodeId)
methods.description: Initializes UDP output with a target node ID.

methods.name: Message
methods.description: Creates a TextMessage and sends it via UDP.
